name: The Empress's Garden
description:
This is a work in progress that you can download to play. Enjoy and explore a beautiful hedge maze and garden environment.

Gameplay: 

WASD to move, E to interact with gates and the blue ball 

Goal: open the large double gates to leave the maze

The large gates can only be opened after you have picked up the blue ball

The small gates in the maze can only be opened from one side
